summary: This is a grand jury indictment from Palm Beach County, Florida, charging Jeffrey E. Epstein with one count of felony solicitation of prostitution. The indictment alleges the offenses occurred on three or more occasions between August 1, 2004, and October 31, 2005.

persons.name: Jeffrey E. Epstein
persons.context: The defendant charged with one count of felony solicitation of prostitution for offenses alleged to have occurred between August 2004 and October 2005.

events.title: Alleged Solicitation of Prostitution
events.description: Jeffrey E. Epstein is alleged to have solicited, induced, enticed, or procured another to commit prostitution, lewdness, or assignation on three or more occasions.

events.title: Grand Jury Indictment
events.description: A grand jury in Palm Beach County, Florida, returns a true bill indicting Jeffrey E. Epstein on one count of felony solicitation of prostitution.

keyFacts: Jeffrey E. Epstein was indicted by a grand jury in Palm Beach County, Florida, in 2006.
The indictment charges Epstein with one count of felony solicitation of prostitution, a third-degree felony.
The alleged criminal activity occurred on three or more occasions between August 1, 2004, and October 31, 2005.
The indictment is based on Florida Statute 796.07, specifically subsections (1), (2)(f), and (4)(c).
The document includes Epstein's personal details: date of birth (January 20, 1953), race (White), sex (Male), and a Social Security number.
